returns._0: Balance of the account for this token

returns.tokenId: The ID of the created token

Array of token IDs owned by the account

params.tokenId: ID of the token to transfer

balanceOf(uint256,address).notice: Get the balance of a user for a specific token

createProcessedToken(string,string,uint2.notice: Create a processed goods token from raw materials (Factory only)

createRawToken(string,string,uint256).notice: Create a raw material token (Producer only)

getTokenHolder(uint256).notice: Get the current holder of a token

getUserTokens(address).notice: Get all tokens owned by an address

transferToken(uint256,address,address,ui.notice: Internal function to transfer token ownership (called by TransferManager)
